resources.string: \"Empowering minds, crafting futures—MindCraft transforms learning into a journey of growth, resilience, and discovery.\"
\"Every student is unique, and so is their learning journey. MindCraft adapts to you, for you.\"
\"Where knowledge meets care—unlock your potential with MindCraft’s tailored support.\"
